title: New: VÉRITÉ – Strange Enough
body:
Opening with a gorgeously washed out synth, _Strange Enough_, the latest track from NYC’s **VÉRITÉ** falls away into into a prelude of the massive chorus that lies ahead.

A subdued verse draws you in, her contemplative vocals soft and brooding and act as the centrepiece of it all. When the chorus hits, it really hits, exploding with a crushing snare as the production is amped up and everything really starts to get going. At just over 10,000 listens and the Hype Machine charts screaming her name, **VÉRITÉ** is certainly one to watch in the closing months of 2014.
